author: henning
msg: Somewhere in the middle of the VelocityService, the author seemed to have
gotten lost between handleRequest and decodeRequest methods which then
alternating started to return current char sets and stuff. Cleaned up
all of this, streamlined the whole handling code.
Reworked the initVelocity Method, which was "interesting" to say
least. Documented the path translation method for changing the
relative pathes for velocity resources.
Some doc fixes, javadocs and stuff.
